column4: I have enabled the "universe" repository on a feisty livecd, yet I can't find this package w/ synaptic or apt-get.. any ideas why? http://packages.ubuntu.com/gutsy/admin/bkhive AND http://packages.ubuntu.com/gutsy/admin/samdump2
I need to recover an XP administrator password from an old ghost image I just restored.. though packages.ubuntu.com shows those tools available they don't show up in the package manager..=0
are you sure those exist on feisty?
